snippet: Local officials say rocket fire into a village in Khost Province killed and a woman and two children.
abstract: NATO airstrike in eastern Afghanistan kills a woman and two children, again raising the issue of civilian casualties at time when both country's presidential election and future of Western troop presence there are unresolved.
lead_paragraph: Local officials say rocket fire into a village in Khost Province killed and a woman and two children.

headline.main: Afghanistan Says NATO Airstrike in East Killed Civilians
headline.print_headline: Afghanistan Says NATO Airstrike in East Killed Civilians
